name: Tide
flavor: The Tide Stances focusing on pushing and pulling water, crushing foes in an oncoming wave while dictating the flow of a battle. This Discipline provides some of the most consistent and powerful options for pushing and pulling enemies. The Tide Discipline allows for the creation of Wet Terrain that will make resisting pushes and pulls even harder and if there are Water Sources present this Discipline can strike from any angle. While its true power is only unleashed near a considerable source of water, the Tide stance can force foes to whatever position you wish.

stances.name: Ebbing Stance
stances.desc: Your waves pull with a vicious undertow, dragging your foes closer to you with an unstoppable riptide.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you _Pull_ an enemy with an Action, gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Whenever you _Hit_/_Crit_ with a Water Action you may add _Pull_ 1 to the effect. If there is an existing _Pull_ on the Attack it is Negated by the same defense, otherwise, (1 _Grit_).
stances.special: Immediately after you cause a _Push_ effect you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to change to this Stance as a Reaction.

stances.name: Flood Stance
stances.desc: You are a master of the tides, covering the battlefield in water as far as the eye can see.
stances.accumulate: Whenever a creature is _Pushed_, _Pulled_, or knocked _Prone_ on _Wet_ Terrain gain 1 _Momentum_, up to a maximum of 4 per round.
stances.effect: Any time you _Hit_/_Crit_ with a Water Attack you may make a space adjacent to the Target _Wet_.
stances.special: You may ignore the effects of _Wet_ Terrain.

stances.name: Flowing Stance
stances.desc: Your waves hit with an impossible force, leaving no avenue for retreat but back.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you _Push_ an enemy with an Action, gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Whenever you _Hit_/_Crit_ with a Water Action you may add _Push_ 1 to the effect. If there is an existing _Push_ on the Attack it is Negated by the same defense, otherwise, (1 _Grit_).
stances.special: Immediately after you cause a _Pull_ effect you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to change to this Stance as a Reaction.

techniques.name: Crushing Pressure
techniques.desc: Your waves holds your opponent against an obstacle for a moment longer, crushing them against the surface.
techniques.trigger: You _Push_/_Pull_ a creature into an Obstacle or a creature with a Water Action.
techniques.effect: Attack the triggering creature with the below Profile. If this triggered off a _Push_/_Pull_ into another creature you may attack both creatures, but have Disadvantage on both attacks.

techniques.name: Crashing Wave
techniques.desc: You pull nearby water towards you, slowly creating a massive wave that comes crashing down with unstoppable force.
techniques.target: A total of at least 4 _Water Sources_ within range.
techniques.effect: _Destroy_ all Targets. Draw a 3 by X Line from you, where X is the total number of the Targets Destroyed and mark is as a _Hazard_. In 3 Phases, at the start of the Phase, Attack with the below Profile in the Area, then _Destroy_ all Terrain in the Area and make it _Wet_.
techniques.boost: X _Momentum_. For every _Momentum_ spent, you may Target up to two additional 2 _Water Sources_.

techniques.name: Surging Stream
techniques.desc: You let loose a jet of water, pummeling an enemy backwards.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile.
techniques.special: If there is a _Water Source_ within Range 6, you may originate this attack from there. For this use, treat the Range as Melee and Area as Line 6. If the _Water Source_ has at least two adjacent _Water Source_s, this Attack gains _Accurate_.

techniques.name: Rushing River
techniques.desc: You propel yourself forward with a wave, before sending that wave crashing forth.
techniques.effect: _Destroy_ a _Water Source_ within Range 4. Attack with the below Profile, then make the Area _Wet_.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. After resolving the Attack you may _Safe_ Move to any point in or adjacent to the Area.

techniques.name: Water Whip
techniques.desc: You form a malleable lash of water, maintaining its form to make a useable weapon.
techniques.effect: Equip the Water Whip Spirit Weapon in your Open Hand. This Enchant ends if you have no Water Whips Wielded.
techniques.boost: 0 _Momentum_. If you have two Open Hands, you may equip a Water Whip in each.

techniques.name: Aqua Lash
techniques.desc: You reach out with a torrent of water, wrapping it around a foe before drawing them close.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile.
techniques.special: If there is a _Water Source_ within Range 6, you may originate this attack from there. For this use, treat the Range as Melee and Area as Line 6. If the _Water Source_ has at least two adjacent _Water Source_s, this Attack gains _Accurate_.

techniques.name: Aqua Ring
techniques.desc: You seize a nearby source of water, manipulating it into a ring around you to launch attacks from unpredictable angles.
techniques.effect: _Destroy_ all Targets. So long as this _Enchant_ persists you may treat any space within a Burst 2 of you as the origin of any Water Attacks, treating it as a _Water Source_ if you wish. You may end this Enchant at any time to gain _Grit_ equal to the number of _Water Source_s within your Aqua Ring.
techniques.special: Once per round on your turn you may pay 2 _Momentum_ to _Destroy_ an additional two _Water Source_s and increase the number of _Water Source_s your Aqua Ring counts as by 1.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Target is instead four _Water Source_s, and you may treat the ring as two _Water Source_s.

techniques.name: Water Sphere
techniques.desc: You pull a source of water free, creating a watery tomb to encase a foe in.
techniques.effect: _Destroy_ all Targets. Create a Size 1 Water Sphere within Range. Any creatures in this space must immediately spend 1 _Reflex_ to Move 1. Otherwise, that creature immediately becomes _Restrained_ within the Watery Sphere. While _Restrained_ in this way the creature takes 3 _True_ Damage at the end of each of their turns and gains _Soaked_ 2. A creature _Restrained_ by the Water Sphere can escape by Sacrificing an Action and expending 1 _Focus_/_Grit_. If a creature moves into a space with a Water Sphere while there is no creature currently _Restrained_ in this space, they immediately become _Restrained_.
techniques.special: When you end this Enchant the spaces containing a Water Sphere and all adjacent spaces become _Wet_.
techniques.boost: 2 or 4 _Momentum_: If you spend 2 _Momentum_, Target is instead 3 _Water Source_s and you create a Size 2 Water Sphere. If you spend 4 _Momentum_, Target is instead 8 _Water Source_s and you create a Size 3 Water Sphere.

techniques.name: Call the Tides
techniques.desc: You become the center of the tides, pushing or pulling all water near you as you please.
techniques.target: All spaces with _Wet_ Terrain or _Water Sources_ within Range.
techniques.effect: You may either _Push_/_Pull_ all Targets. Repeat twice. Any creature in a Target space suffers the same _Push_/_Pull_. A creature may spend 1 _Reflex_ to negate this for the remainder of the Turn. If a creature would collide with an obstacle, they are knocked _Prone_.
techniques.special: A _Water Source_ that is moved out of its original space by this effect instead creates _Wet_ Terrain adjacent to the _Water Source_.

techniques.name: Hydroplane
techniques.desc: You run along water, treating it just as stable as the ground itself.
techniques.effect: This Movement may be used to move along _Water Source_s as if they were normal terrain.
techniques.special: All Movement from this ability on either a _Water Source_/_Wet_ Terrain is _Safe_.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Up to three times, make a space you move through _Wet_.
techniques.imbue: 1 _Momentum_: You may treat all _Water Source_s as if they were normal terrain for this entire round and may safely end your turn on _Water Source_s.

techniques.name: Aquatic Armor
techniques.desc: You create a thin coat of water around the target, providing a simple defense and quenching flames.
techniques.effect: The Target gains 2 _Grit_, 5 _Vigor_, and _Soaked_ 1x2.
techniques.boost: X _Momentum. For every 2 _Momentum_ spent you may _Destroy_ a _Water Source_ within Range 4 repeat this Action.

techniques.name: Water Wall
techniques.desc: A wave surges up in front of you, providing powerful, if temporary, defense.
techniques.effect: Reduce the Attack Roll by 1. If the Attack was Melee, you may _Push_ the Attacker 2 (1 _Grit_). If the Attack was Ranged, gain Cover against it.
techniques.special: If you are on or adjacent to _Wet_ Terrain reduce the Cost of this Reaction by 1.

name: Tundra
flavor: Conjuring great constructs out of ice, masters of the Tundra Stance create weapons as beautiful as they are deadly. Tundra abilities commonly inflict Frost, which limits the mobility and offensive power of foes. They also create a great deal of Icy terrain, which removes foes ability to manuever in a fine way across the map. With this combination and their ability to conjure armor for themselves, masters of the Tundra Discipline can easily keep a foe in close proximity while limiting their ability to attack. Tundra Techniques are also somewhat dependant on Wet terrain, and are typically more effective against Soaked targets, creating an inherent synergy with the Tide Discipline.

stances.name: Frostbite Stance
stances.desc: You are an avatar of ice and cold, creating a dangerous vortex of ice around you.
stances.accumulate: The first time on each of your Turns you inflict _Frost_, gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Create a _Burst 2_ around you. Whenever a creature ends its turn there they gain _Frost_ 1 (1 _Grit_).

stances.name: Frostguard Stance
stances.desc: While normally frost is a hindrance, you have learned to weaponize it and make it a valuable tool.
stances.accumulate: Gain _Momentum_ equal to your topmost _Frost_ Token..
stances.effect: Anytime you apply _Frost_ to an enemy you may gain the same Token. At the end of any of your turns you may remove the topmost _Frost_ Token and either gain _Grit_ equal to its value or _Ice Armor_ equal to half its value.
stances.special: You may choose not to clear your _Frost_ Tokens. You may always choose the order of your _Frost_ Tokens.

stances.name: Skating Stance
stances.desc: The ice is your home, allowing you to slip and slide with ethereal grace.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you start a Turn on _Icy_ Terrain, gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: All Movement you make on _Icy_ Terrain is _Safe_.
stances.special: You may ignore the effects of _Icy_ Terrain.

techniques.name: Ice Spike
techniques.desc: You take advantage of a foe's footing on the ice, creating a dangerous hazard.
techniques.trigger: A foe moves into an _Icy_ space, moves adjacent to an _Ice Wall_, or falls _Prone_ in an _Icy_ space.
techniques.effect: Choose an _Icy_/_Ice Wall_ space adjacent to the creature within Range. If it is _Icy_, _Destroy_ it and replace it with _Icicle_ Terrain. If it was an _Ice Wall_, create a _Icicle_ space in an adjacent square. Attack with the below Profile against the triggering Target.
techniques.special: If this is triggered off of a target falling _Prone_ on _Icy_ Terrain you may choose the space they are currently in. Resolve the Effect as normal, but you have Advantage on the Attack, and the creature immediately suffers the penalty of the _Icicle_ Terrain as if they had moved into it.

techniques.name: Icy Burst
techniques.desc: You harden the ice on a creature in a frozen burst, striking with jagged shards.
techniques.effect: Deal damage to the Target equal to twice their topmost _Frost_ Token. If the Target is a Waterbound, they may pay 2 _Reflex_ or 2 _Focus_ to negate this attack.
techniques.special: After resolving the attack, you may replace any amount of the target's _Frost_ Tokens with _Bleed_ Tokens of the same value.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Add a Burst 1 Area to the attack centered on the Target. Deal damage equal to that creature's topmost _Frost_ Token in the Area and inflict _Frost_ 1 (1 _Reflex_).

techniques.name: Ice Knife
techniques.desc: You harden water into jagged blades before sending them flying towards a foe.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Halve the Damage, but you may repeat this Strike immediately after using it.

techniques.name: Ice Storm
techniques.desc: A whirling storm of ice and cold forms on the battlefield, threatening all in its path.
techniques.effect: Destroy the _Water Source_s. Attack with the below Profile. After the Attack, the Area becomes _Icy_.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. This Attack now requires 5 _Water Source_s in Range, but is a Blast 2.

techniques.name: Frost Lance
techniques.desc: A hardened lance of impossibly hard ice forms in your hand, creating a deadly tool.
techniques.effect: Equip the Frost Lance Spirit Weapon in your Open Hand. This Enchant ends if you have no Frost Lance Wielded.
techniques.boost: 0 _Momentum_. If you have two Open Hands, you may equip a Frost Lance in each.

techniques.name: Glacial Guard
techniques.desc: You freeze your body, limiting your movement but enhancing your defense.
techniques.effect: Gain 2 _Grit_, 1 _Ice Armor_, and your choice of _Frost_ 1 or _2_.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. You are _Stuck_ until the end of the Round. While you are _Stuck_, you may spend _Frost_ as _Grit_.

techniques.name: Creeping Frost
techniques.desc: You use the little water in the air to freeze the ground, creating a thin sheet of ice that makes maneuvering difficult.
techniques.effect: The Target spaces become _Icy_. Any creatures in these spaces gain _Hobbled_ 1 (1 _Reflex_).
techniques.special: When choosing Targets, _Wet_ spaces only count as half of a space.
techniques.boost:
X _Momentum_. Increase the number of Target spaces by X.
	1 _Momentum_: You may replace as many _Icy_ spaces with _Icicle_ spaces as you wish.

techniques.name: Flash Freeze
techniques.desc: You attempt to freeze a creature solid, hardening the water and ice already around them.
techniques.effect:
Choose either _Frost_/_Soaked_.
If you choose _Frost_ and the creature has at least 1 _Frost_ Token, they gain 1 _Frost_ or increase one of their _Frost_ Token value by 1, to a maximum of 3. (1 _Reflex_).
If you choose _Frost_ and the creature has at least 3 _Frost_, they gain _Frost_ 2 or increase two of their _Frost_ Token values by 1, to a maximum of 3. (2 _Reflex_).
If you choose _Frost_ and the creature has at least 5 _Frost_, they are immediately _Restrained_ (3 _Grit_).
If you choose _Soaked_ you may convert any number of that creature's _Soaked_ Tokens to _Frost_ Tokens of the same value (2 _Reflex_).
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Resolve the _Soaked_ version of the Effect, then the _Frost_ version of the Effect.

techniques.name: Frozen Wall
techniques.desc: You shape the existing water into rigid structures of ice, .
techniques.effect: Destroy the Targets. Create a number of contiguous _Ice Wall_s within Range depending on the Destroyed Targets. For every two _Wet_/_Icy_ spaces you may create a single _Ice Wall_ and for every _Water Source_ you may create one _Ice Wall_.
techniques.special: If you create an _Ice Wall_ in a space where you Destroyed a Target, creatures adjacent to that space gain _Frost_ 1 (1 _Reflex_).
techniques.boost: X _Momentum_. Increase the number of Targets by X.

techniques.name: Icy Grasp
techniques.target: A creature completely on _Icy_/_Wet_ Terrain that is not _Flying_.
techniques.desc: You freeze a target's feet to the ground, rooting them in place.
techniques.effect: The Target becomes _Stuck_ (2 _Reflex_). They may end this _Stuck_ by Sacrificing an Action and spending 1 _Grit_.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. If the Target is _Prone_ they are instead _Restrained_ (3 _Reflex_).  They may end this _Restrained_ by Sacrificing an Action and spending 3 _Grit_.

techniques.name: Phase Change
techniques.desc: You rapidly change the form of water, either hardening it to ice or returning it to a liquid form.
techniques.effect: You may change Target _Icy_ and _Ice Wall_ spaces to _Wet_/_Icicle_, Target _Wet_ spaces to _Icy_/_Icicle_, and Target _Water Source_s to _Icy_/_Icicle_. You may not target a _Water Source_ with a creature within.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Target is instead a _Water Source_ with a creature within. That creature is immediately _Entombed_ (3 _Reflex_) in an _Ice Wall_ that replaces the _Water Source_. A creature may end _Entomb_ by spending 3 _Grit_ on their turn.

techniques.name: Skate
techniques.desc: You propel yourself forward, using a thin sheet of ice beneath your feet to propel yourself forward.
techniques.effect: Create two _Icy_ spaces in squares you move through this turn. You may forgo creating two _Icy_ spaces to instead Destroy an _Icy_ space you move through and create an _Ice Wall_ there. You may immediately change direction after creating this _Ice Wall_, even if you are still on _Icy_ Terrain.
techniques.special: _Wet_ and _Water Source_ spaces of your choice you move through become _Icy_.
techniques.boost:
X _Momentum. You may create an additional X _Icy_ spaces.
	2 _Momentum_: Instead, _Wet_ and _Water Source_ spaces of your choice you move through or adjacent to become _Icy_.

name: Bloodbind
flavor: A skilled Waterbonded can control blood like any other liquid, either to staunch bleeding and heal or turn foes into gruesome puppets.

name: Still Waters
flavor: Water Spirits can easily drown out intense emotions, creating a sense of calm through Still Water techniques.

name: Rippleread
flavor: Water can reach into the past, allowing a Waterbonded to see the history of objects, or force a foe to briefly experience past trauma.
